species.name: parasect
descriptions: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
It is controlled by a mushroom grown larger than the bug body. It is said to prefer damp places.
It scatters toxic spores from its mushroom cap. Once harvested, these spores can be steeped and boiled down to prepare herbal medicines.
Its poisonous spores are also used in traditional medicine. Apparently, spores produced in Alola are not of very good quality.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
